Public Instance methods

fetch_rows(sql) {|row| ...}

[Source]

     # File lib/sequel/adapters/oracle.rb, line 108
108:       def fetch_rows(sql, &block)
109:         execute(sql) do |cursor|
110:           begin
111:             @columns = cursor.get_col_names.map{|c| output_identifier(c)}
112:             while r = cursor.fetch
113:               row = {}
114:               r.each_with_index {|v, i| row[@columns[i]] = v unless @columns[i] == :raw_rnum_}
115:               yield row
116:             end
117:           ensure
118:             cursor.close
119:           end
120:         end
121:         self
122:       end

[Validate]
